name: Gungar.io
description:
IMPORTANT - Safari has issues extracting files and can't load

Introduction

We are a small team of two embarking on our first project. We hope to make a fast-paced 2D online multiplayer shooter game that leverages nostalgic graphics and gameplay for people who are short on time and love to connect and play with their peers. We aim to combine the nostalgic gameplay of old flash games with the fresh gamemodes and mechanics of modern day shooters!

Gameplay

For multiplayer gamemodes, currently FFA is set to a size of 2, TDM and CP are set to a lobby of 4. If you have friends to play together with, great! You will be able to see the available sessions in the bottom right corner.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Left Click - Shoot

Tab (In-game) - Scoreboard

Esc (In-game) - Pause Menu

The game may take longer to load the first time.

This game is still in development, any comments are much appreciated!
